system.description: When you try to de-escalate a dangerous situation, roll with the most relevant stat. +Force to overcome through strength, +Lore to find the right words, +Steel to act under pressure, +Sway to win them over.

failure.label: Miss (6-)
failure.value: The situation escalates beyond your control. The GM will tell you how things get worse.

partial.label: Weak Hit (7-9)
partial.value: You defuse the immediate threat, but choose one: you make a costly concession, you only delay the inevitable, or you create a new complication.

success.label: Strong Hit (10+)
success.value: You successfully defuse the situation. Describe how you resolve the tension.
